languages.text: "Если бы я мог показать тебе паутину причин и следствий, пронизывающую мир, ты бы понял{mf||а}. Эти нити столь многочисленны и плотно переплетены, что заставляют саму реальность вокруг нас иметь плотность, и анализ их — поистине хитроумный процесс. В великой медитации мне открылась статистическая вероятность, ведшая к этому моменту, и я последовал за ней. Как видишь, она сработала".

"If I could show you the web of cause and effect that permeates the world, you would understand. Its threads are so numerous and so densely intertwined that they give density to the very reality around us, and analysing them is an intricate process indeed. During my great meditation, a statistical probability was revealed to me which led to this moment in time, and I followed it. As you can see, it has worked."
languages.original_text: "Если бы я мог показать тебе паутину причин и следствий, пронизывающую мир, ты бы понял{mf||а}. Эти нити столь многочисленны и плотно переплетены, что заставляют саму реальность вокруг нас иметь плотность, и анализ их — поистине хитроумный процесс. В великой медитации мне открылась статистическая вероятность, ведшая к этому моменту, и я последовал за ней. Как видишь, она сработала".

languages.text: “如果我能让你看到贯穿这个世界的因果之网，你就会理解我的决定。丝线实在是太多了，如此密集地交织在一起，甚至让我们周围的现实都产生了密度。分析这些丝线确实是个非常繁复的过程。在我无尽的冥想之中，我看到了实现目前这个局面的概率，一步步遵循着计划行事。正如你所见到的一样，我的计划成功了。”
languages.original_text: "If I could show you the web of cause and effect that permeates the world, you would understand. Its threads are so numerous and so densely intertwined that they give density to the very reality around us, and analysing them is an intricate process indeed. During my great meditation, a statistical probability was revealed to me which led to this moment in time, and I followed it. As you can see, it has worked."

traits.locale_text: “如果我能让你看到贯穿这个世界的因果之网，你就会理解我的决定。丝线实在是太多了，如此密集地交织在一起，甚至让我们周围的现实都产生了密度。分析这些丝线确实是个非常繁复的过程。在我无尽的冥想之中，我看到了实现目前这个局面的概率，一步步遵循着计划行事。正如你所见到的一样，我的计划成功了。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Si pudiera enseñarle la telaraña de causas y efectos que inunda el mundo, lo entendería. Sus hilos son tan numerosos y están tan entrelazados que dan densidad a la realidad que nos rodea. Analizarlos es un proceso muy complejo. Durante mi gran meditación, descubrí una probabilidad estadística que llevaba a este momento de la historia y la seguí. Como puede ver, funcionó».
languages.original_text: "If I could show you the web of cause and effect that permeates the world, you would understand. Its threads are so numerous and so densely intertwined that they give density to the very reality around us, and analysing them is an intricate process indeed. During my great meditation, a statistical probability was revealed to me which led to this moment in time, and I followed it. As you can see, it has worked."

traits.locale_text: «Si pudiera enseñarle la telaraña de causas y efectos que inunda el mundo, lo entendería. Sus hilos son tan numerosos y están tan entrelazados que dan densidad a la realidad que nos rodea. Analizarlos es un proceso muy complejo. Durante mi gran meditación, descubrí una probabilidad estadística que llevaba a este momento de la historia y la seguí. Como puede ver, funcionó».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「世界に張り巡らされた因果の網を見れば、理解してもらえるだろう。その糸はとても多く、とても密に絡み合っていて、我らを取り巻く現実そのものに密度を与えている。それを分析するのは実に複雑な作業だ。大いなる瞑想の最中に、ある統計的確率が明らかになり、それが今この瞬間につながり、私はそれに従ったのだ。見ての通り、それはうまくいったのだ」
languages.original_text: "If I could show you the web of cause and effect that permeates the world, you would understand. Its threads are so numerous and so densely intertwined that they give density to the very reality around us, and analysing them is an intricate process indeed. During my great meditation, a statistical probability was revealed to me which led to this moment in time, and I followed it. As you can see, it has worked."

traits.locale_text: 「世界に張り巡らされた因果の網を見れば、理解してもらえるだろう。その糸はとても多く、とても密に絡み合っていて、我らを取り巻く現実そのものに密度を与えている。それを分析するのは実に複雑な作業だ。大いなる瞑想の最中に、ある統計的確率が明らかになり、それが今この瞬間につながり、私はそれに従ったのだ。見ての通り、それはうまくいったのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Könnte ich Euch das Netz aus Ursache und Wirkung zeigen, das die Welt durchzieht, würdet Ihr es verstehen. Seine Fäden sind so zahlreich und so dicht miteinander verwoben, dass sie der Realität um uns herum Dichte verleihen, und sie zu analysieren ist ein äußerst aufwändiger Prozess. Während meiner großen Meditation wurde mir eine statistische Wahrscheinlichkeit offenbart, die zu diesem Augenblick führt, und ich bin ihr gefolgt. Wir Ihr sehen könnt, hat es funktioniert."
languages.original_text: "If I could show you the web of cause and effect that permeates the world, you would understand. Its threads are so numerous and so densely intertwined that they give density to the very reality around us, and analysing them is an intricate process indeed. During my great meditation, a statistical probability was revealed to me which led to this moment in time, and I followed it. As you can see, it has worked."

traits.locale_text: "Könnte ich Euch das Netz aus Ursache und Wirkung zeigen, das die Welt durchzieht, würdet Ihr es verstehen. Seine Fäden sind so zahlreich und so dicht miteinander verwoben, dass sie der Realität um uns herum Dichte verleihen, und sie zu analysieren ist ein äußerst aufwändiger Prozess. Während meiner großen Meditation wurde mir eine statistische Wahrscheinlichkeit offenbart, die zu diesem Augenblick führt, und ich bin ihr gefolgt. Wir Ihr sehen könnt, hat es funktioniert."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Si je pouvais vous montrer l'enchevêtrement de causes et de conséquences qui imprègne ce monde, vous comprendriez. Les fils de leur toile sont si nombreux et si serrés qu'ils donnent une masse à la réalité qui nous entoure, et leur analyse est un processus très complexe. Lors de ma grande méditation, une probabilité statistique s'est imposée à moi ; elle conduisait à ce point précis du temps, et je l'ai suivie. Comme vous pouvez le constater, le plan a fonctionné. »
languages.original_text: "If I could show you the web of cause and effect that permeates the world, you would understand. Its threads are so numerous and so densely intertwined that they give density to the very reality around us, and analysing them is an intricate process indeed. During my great meditation, a statistical probability was revealed to me which led to this moment in time, and I followed it. As you can see, it has worked."

traits.locale_text: « Si je pouvais vous montrer l'enchevêtrement de causes et de conséquences qui imprègne ce monde, vous comprendriez. Les fils de leur toile sont si nombreux et si serrés qu'ils donnent une masse à la réalité qui nous entoure, et leur analyse est un processus très complexe. Lors de ma grande méditation, une probabilité statistique s'est imposée à moi ; elle conduisait à ce point précis du temps, et je l'ai suivie. Comme vous pouvez le constater, le plan a fonctionné. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "If I could show you the web of cause and effect that permeates the world, you would understand. Its threads are so numerous and so densely intertwined that they give density to the very reality around us, and analysing them is an intricate process indeed. During my great meditation, a statistical probability was revealed to me which led to this moment in time, and I followed it. As you can see, it has worked."

languages.text: "Sana dünyanın çok evvelinde var olan sebep ve sonuç ağını gösterebilseydim sen de anlardın. İplikleri o kadar çoktur ve o kadar yoğun bir şekilde iç içe geçmiştir ki çevremizdeki gerçekliğe yoğunluğunu o verir. Bunları analiz etmek çetrefilli bir işlem olsa gerek. Büyük meditasyonumda bana, beni bu ana ulaştıracak istatistiksel bir ihtimal açık edildi. Ben de onun peşinden gittim. Görüldüğü üzere işe yaradı."
languages.original_text: "If I could show you the web of cause and effect that permeates the world, you would understand. Its threads are so numerous and so densely intertwined that they give density to the very reality around us, and analysing them is an intricate process indeed. During my great meditation, a statistical probability was revealed to me which led to this moment in time, and I followed it. As you can see, it has worked."

traits.locale_text: "Sana dünyadan çok daha öncesinde var olan sebep ve sonuç ağını gösterebilseydim sen de anlardın. İplikleri o kadar çoktur ve o kadar yoğun bir şekilde iç içe geçmiştir ki çevremizdeki gerçekliğe yoğunluğunu o verir. Bunları analiz etmek çetrefilli bir işlem olsa gerek. Büyük meditasyonum sırasında bana, beni bu ana ulaştıracak istatistiksel bir ihtimal açık edildi ve ben de onun peşinden gittim. Gördüğün gibi, işe yaradı."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
